title: Shortcut to Google Routines
content:
How can I create a shortcut on my Pixel XL's home screen to a specific Google routine that I have already made?

Is it possible to create a shortcut to a specific Google routine that actives the routine? 

If it is not possible, is there a way to create a shortcut to view all of my Google routines?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel
